item.title: Product Page Tabs Extension avaiable for download!
item.description: Product Page Tabs adds to product page tabs for description, specifications related products and tags.

item.title: Widget tag products extension is avaiable now!
item.description: Widget tag products extension allows you to make custom cms pages with product list/grid as it on category page. This way you can make custom pages with subselection of products by tags. It also can be used for brands pages.

item.title: Mass / Bulkd Add To Cart extension avaiable!
item.description: The extension adds ability to make mass ( bulk) order of configurable products with different options.
